description:
<h1><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>PRACTICE EDUCATOR</strong></span></h1>
<p>The Emergency Department at Torbay Hospital is expanding its Education Team and requires an experienced Emergency Nurse to join them for 23hrs/week at B6. They will work under the supervision of the B7 PE, and alongside the current B6. As a team they will be responsible for ensuring the wider team are competent in all areas of emergency nursing, and drive forward a comprehensive teaching programme that ensures the care and treatment we give is based on the most up to date and relevant research.</p>

hiringOrganization.name: Torbay and South Devon NHS Foundation Trust

title: Practice Educator
